ice_creams.name: Stracciatella Delight
ice_creams.review: A classic Italian favorite. The perfect balance of creamy vanilla and crunchy chocolate chips.

ice_creams.name: Pistachio Paradise
ice_creams.review: Authentic Sicilian pistachio flavor. Rich, nutty, and not too sweet.

ice_creams.name: Tiramisu Dream
ice_creams.review: Tastes just like the dessert! The coffee flavor is strong but not overpowering.

ice_creams.name: Fragola Fresca
ice_creams.review: Made with fresh strawberries. Tastes like summer in a scoop!

ice_creams.name: Nocciola Nirvana
ice_creams.review: Intense hazelnut flavor. Creamy and indulgent.

ice_creams.name: Limoncello Zest
ice_creams.review: Refreshing and tangy. You can taste the limoncello liqueur!

ice_creams.name: Cioccolato Fondente
ice_creams.review: Rich and intense dark chocolate flavor. Not too sweet, perfect for chocolate lovers.

ice_creams.name: Amarena Cherry Bliss
ice_creams.review: Creamy base with swirls of amarena cherry. The cherries add a delightful tartness.

ice_creams.name: Fior di Latte Purity
ice_creams.review: Simple yet delicious. The pure taste of high-quality milk and cream.

ice_creams.name: Bacio Blast
ice_creams.review: Inspired by Bacio chocolates. Perfect blend of chocolate and hazelnut.

ice_creams.name: Mango Tango
ice_creams.review: Tastes like fresh mangoes. Creamy and fruity, perfect for hot days.

ice_creams.name: Zabaione Zenith
ice_creams.review: Rich and boozy. The marsala wine adds a unique depth of flavor.

ice_creams.name: Mint Chip Madness
ice_creams.review: Refreshing mint with dark chocolate chips. A classic combination done right.

ice_creams.name: Caramel Swirl Sensation
ice_creams.review: Creamy vanilla base with ribbons of salted caramel. Indulgent and satisfying.

ice_creams.name: Coconut Bliss
ice_creams.review: Tastes like a tropical vacation. Made with real coconut cream.

ice_creams.name: Malaga Raisin Rum
ice_creams.review: Rum-soaked raisins in a creamy base. A grown-up flavor that's not too boozy.

ice_creams.name: Berries & Cream
ice_creams.review: A medley of fresh berries in a sweet cream base. Fruity and refreshing.

ice_creams.name: Ricotta & Fig Fantasy
ice_creams.review: Creamy ricotta base with chunks of candied figs. A unique and delicious combination.

ice_creams.name: Espresso Jolt
ice_creams.review: Intense coffee flavor. Made with freshly brewed espresso for a real kick.

ice_creams.name: Cassata Siciliana
ice_creams.review: Inspired by the traditional Sicilian dessert. A complex flavor with every bite.

ice_creams.name: Vanilla Bean Supreme
ice_creams.review: Simple but perfect. Made with real vanilla beans for an intense flavor.

ice_creams.name: Salted Pretzel Crunch
ice_creams.review: Sweet and salty perfection. The pretzel pieces add a satisfying crunch.

ice_creams.name: Affogato Allure
ice_creams.review: Vanilla ice cream with a coffee ripple. Tastes like the classic Italian dessert.

ice_creams.name: Panna Cotta Pleasure
ice_creams.review: Inspired by the Italian dessert. Creamy and indulgent with a caramel swirl.

ice_creams.name: Torroncino Treat
ice_creams.review: Based on the Italian nougat candy. Honey-sweet with crunchy nut pieces.

ice_creams.name: Gianduia Gem
ice_creams.review: The famous Turin chocolate in ice cream form. Rich and nutty.

ice_creams.name: Zuppa Inglese Zest
ice_creams.review: Based on the classic Italian trifle. A complex flavor with a hint of liqueur.

ice_creams.name: Crema Catalana Crisp
ice_creams.review: Inspired by the Spanish dessert. Creamy custard flavor with a caramel crunch.

ice_creams.name: Pistacchio di Bronte DOP
ice_creams.review: Made with premium pistachios from Bronte, Sicily. Intense, pure pistachio flavor.

ice_creams.name: Mascarpone Madness
ice_creams.review: Rich and creamy, tastes like frozen cheesecake. Indulgent and satisfying.

ice_creams.name: tolia
ice_creams.review: yummy

ice_creams.name: escimo
ice_creams.review: yummy

ice_creams.name: Algida
ice_creams.review: delicious

ice_creams.name: Barambino
ice_creams.review: In cups, yummy

ice_creams.name: Tiramisu Dream
ice_creams.review: Intense coffee flavor
